text: That sound really exciting.  Try to keep notes of your process or film on your phone and make a little behind the scenes film if you have time.  They are great to show people how you work etc.  Here is a lovely example that I like. <https://vimeo.com/208796451>

attachments.title: Poles Apart Making Of
attachments.text: A behind the scenes look at Poles Apart, a stop-motion animation.
attachments.fallback: Vimeo Video: Poles Apart Making Of

text: thank you I will keep that in mind
